reasoning:

**My Jokers (very strong Three of a Kind setup):**

**Analysis:**

Since I can't make any purchases, I should just move to the round select to face the Boss Blind.

Looking at my last Three of a Kind hand, I scored 14,175 chips. Boss Blinds at Ante 4 typically require around 11,000-15,000 chips depending on the specific boss. 

With this setup, I should have enough power to beat the boss. I'll proceed to the next round since there's nothing to purchase here.
